mapper.select: SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM TMG_WORK_MONTHLYOUTPUTLIST WHERE TWMO_CCUSTOMERID = #{custId} AND TWMO_CCOMPANYID = #{compId} AND TWMO_DYYYYMM >= GREATEST( to_date( #{targetYear}, 'yyyy/mm/dd' ) - 1, TRUNC( to_date( #{introductionData}, 'yyyy/mm/dd' ), 'MM' ) ) AND TWMO_DYYYYMM <= LEAST( TRUNC( SYSDATE, 'MM' ), DECODE( TRUNC( SYSDATE, 'YYYY' ), to_date( #{targetYear}, 'yyyy/mm/dd' ), ADD_MONTHS( to_date( #{targetYear}, 'yyyy/mm/dd' ), 11 ), ADD_MONTHS( to_date( #{targetYear}, 'yyyy/mm/dd' ), 10 ) ) ) AND TWMO_DMODIFIEDDATE >= TRUNC( SYSDATE ) ;
